name: Toppled Statue
description: A fallen statue that once honored a great figure now lies broken and forgotten. The materials and artistic value can be salvaged, while the historical significance and potential magical properties attract collectors and scholars.
atmosphere: Broken stone figure lies like fallen giant with once-proud features now weathered and forgotten. Air carries old stone, artistic beauty, and lost honor dust scent. Fingertips trace weathered features that once commanded respect. Skin tingles with sense of historical significance and potential magical properties. Taste of fallen glory and artistic value fills mouth. Weight of forgotten honor and broken beauty presses down on you.
